short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add any website URL to open automatically when you open a new tab in Chrome.

Customize your browsing experience with this New Tab Page overrider extension! This simple yet powerful tool lets you set any URL as your new tab page, offering a personalized and creative way to start your web sessions. Whether you want quick access to your favorite work resources or a personal touch with your go-to websites, this extension has you covered.

This extension is perfect for professionals who need to streamline their workflow, students who want quick access to educational resources, and anyone who values a personalized online experience. With Custom New Tab Page, you take control of your browserâ€™s start page, turning every new tab into a gateway to your favorite online destinations.
